titles.title: To extend temporarily the duty suspension on 2-(Methoxycarbonyl)benzylsulfonamide.
To extend temporarily the duty suspension on 2-(Methoxycarbonyl)benzylsulfonamide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the duty suspension on 2-(Methoxycarbonyl)benzylsulfonamide.
